entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #60633
  • HttpConnectionContext.TickHeartbeat() in SignalR ticks after the context is disposed, causing runtime errors when accessing context from heartbeat handlers #60631
  • MapOpenApi writes invalid json if example contains OpenApiDouble and CurrentCulture formats doubles with comma #60628
  • Router rerender view when navigating to same page if using Navigating #60626
  • Perf regression: json #60625

Closed

  • Perf improvement: single_query #60582
  • Perf improvement: updates #60624
  • HasAllowAnonymous() could be called earlier? Possible (small) improvement? #60611
  • OpenAPI example rendered incorrectly for strings that happen to be DateTime(Offset) strings #60630
  • Microsoft Identity is not blocking users not yet confirmed #60586
  • Blazor .NET 8 Automatic Logout on Plesk Hosting #60533
  • Issues with Blazor wwwroot folder moved to a subfolder #60627
  • Perf regression: updates #60615
  • Especialista Cibernético Hackear Celular Android ou Iphone #60621
  • NativeAOT: No coercion operator is defined between types 'Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringValues' and 'System.String' #60609

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Initial support for persisting component state #60634
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Fix MD linting in area-owners.md #60632
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix incorrect path to included script file in Blazor project template #60607
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview3
  • Update branding to servicing #60620
    area-infrastructure
  • Upgrade Facebook Graph API version to v22.0 #59387
    area-auth, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • view-data-* attribute for partial tag helper #60459
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Clarify DefaultPolicy and FallbackPolicy Behavior in XML Docs #60619
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Add support for ServerSentEventsResult and extension methods #60616
    area-minimal
  • Support resolving OpenAPI server URLs from HttpRequest #60617
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Abstract away the TestServer dependency from WebApplicationBuilder #60247
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
